sn35.8:1.3: Evaṁ passaṁ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako atītasmiṁ cakkhusmiṁ anapekkho hoti;
sn35.8:1.5: paccuppannassa cakkhussa nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti.
sn35.8:1.10: Evaṁ passaṁ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako atītāya jivhāya anapekkho hoti;
sn35.8:1.12: paccuppannāya jivhāya nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti.
sn35.8:1.16: Evaṁ passaṁ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako atītasmiṁ manasmiṁ anapekkho hoti;
sn35.8:1.18: paccuppannassa manassa nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hotī”ti.
